The website TreeHacks on LinkedIn is announcing that applications for STANFORD TREEHACKS 2024 are now open! The event will take place from February 16th-18th, 2024, offering opportunities for beginners to experts to participate in this hackathon. Non-Stanford applications are due on December 11th, while Stanford student applications are due on December 30th. The event includes food, transport, accommodations, and various activities. Visit http://treehacks.com to apply and find more information.
